name: Puzzle Bobble 2X
overview:
Shoot colored bubbles towards clusters of other bubbles. When groups of similarly colored bubbles are formed, the bubbles burst. In competetive mode, if more than three bubbles burst at once, they will be added to the opponents screen.

This is an expanded version of Puzzle Bobble 2. It has the extra mode builtin, so the cheat "A-left-right-A" is not needed. Also it has a Christmas and a Happy New Year intro. Either or none of them can be choosen from the menu in the test section.

Unlike other games in the series, this one was exclusively released in Japan.
